commentary.revenue_performance: Revenue grew 9% YoY, matching the transaction growth of 9%, but **volume growth was flattish (zero)**. This was due to price increases/rationalizations.
commentary.profitability: Operating Profit grew 37% YoY, with a strong margin of 15.6%. Profitability was helped by significant deflation in **palm oil (21%)** and packaging materials (laminates, corrugated boxes).
commentary.business_outlook: The priority is to grow the top line and volume, making sure the business becomes robust and healthy. Capex for FY24 was guided to be Rs 400 crores to Rs 450 crores.
commentary.key_challenges: Sluggishness in **rural and traditional trade markets**. Market share was lost to local players who became aggressive with pricing/schemes as inflation receded.
commentary.strategic_initiatives: Direct reach was 26.7 lakh outlets and rural distributors were at 28,000. Commercial production scaled up at the new Barabanki (UP) and Perundurai (TN) factories. NPD contributed >10% of dairy revenue.
commentary.market_conditions: Commodity inflation was 3% on flour and 1% on sugar, but large deflation on others. The industry was in a phase of competitive price corrections.
